actor_awards.notes: Won the Golden Globe for New Star of the Year (Actor) in 1951. Known for his athletic dance style, he starred in numerous musicals in the 1950s before becoming a successful director.

filmography.title: Oklahoma!
filmography.role_description: A cowboy who travels to Kansas City and returns with tales of modern wonders and a desire to marry Ado Annie.
filmography.plot: In the Oklahoma territory at the turn of the twentieth century, two young cowboys vie with an evil ranch hand and a traveling peddler for the hearts of the women they love.

filmography.title: Lullaby of Broadway
filmography.role_description: A talented dancer who partners with the main character upon her return to New York.
filmography.plot: A singer returns to New York to visit her mother, only to find that her mother's life has taken a downward turn.

filmography.title: Tea for Two
filmography.role_description: A dancer and love interest in this musical loosely based on 'No, No, Nanette'.
filmography.plot: An heiress must say 'no' to every question for 24 hours in order to win a bet and finance her boyfriend's show.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – New Star of the Year (Gene Nelson)

filmography.title: Crime Wave
filmography.role_description: A reformed convict trying to live a straight life who gets dragged back into crime by escaped prisoners.
filmography.plot: An ex-con trying to go straight is forced to participate in a bank robbery by his former cellmates, while a tough cop watches his every move.

filmography.title: The West Point Story
filmography.role_description: A cadet at West Point who is the talented nephew of a Broadway producer.
filmography.plot: A Broadway director goes to West Point to help the cadets put on a show.

filmography.title: She's Working Her Way Through College
filmography.role_description: A college football star and dancer who falls for a burlesque queen turned student.
filmography.plot: A burlesque dancer enrolls in college to write a play, causing a scandal when her past is revealed.

filmography.title: Three Sailors and a Girl
filmography.role_description: A sailor who invests the crew's money in a Broadway show.
filmography.plot: Three sailors on leave in New York invest their shipmates' funds in a musical that turns out to be a flop.

filmography.title: So This Is Paris
filmography.role_description: One of three sailors on leave in Paris who finds romance and adventure.
filmography.plot: Three sailors on leave in Paris romance three women while trying to help war orphans.

filmography.title: The Daughter of Rosie O'Grady
filmography.role_description: A theatrical producer who falls in love with the daughter of a famous vaudevillian.
filmography.plot: A widower opposes his daughters' desire to go into show business, but they disobey him.

filmography.title: Apartment for Peggy
filmography.role_description: A friend of the young couple struggling with post-war housing.
filmography.plot: A retired professor takes in a young pregnant woman and her veteran husband, finding a new lease on life.

filmography.title: She's Back on Broadway
filmography.role_description: A dancer who helps an aging star make a comeback.
filmography.plot: A fading Hollywood star returns to Broadway to revive her career with the help of a former flame.

filmography.title: The Atomic Man
filmography.role_description: An American reporter in London who investigates a man found floating in the river with a radioactive brain.
filmography.plot: A reporter uncovers a plot involving a scientist who has been brought back to life with a radioactive brain.

filmography.title: Painting the Clouds with Sunshine
filmography.role_description: A wealthy man who becomes a romantic interest for one of the 'Gold Diggers' in Las Vegas.
filmography.plot: Three women head to Las Vegas in search of rich husbands, a musical remake of 'Gold Diggers of 1933'.

filmography.title: The Way Out
filmography.role_description: An American in England who kills a man in self-defense and goes on the run with his wife.
filmography.plot: A man on the run for murder tries to escape the country with the help of his wife.

filmography.title: Gentleman's Agreement
filmography.role_description: A small but memorable role as a soldier involved in a confrontation.
filmography.plot: A reporter pretends to be Jewish in order to cover a story on anti-Semitism, and personally discovers the true depths of bigotry and hatred.

filmography.title: Starlift
filmography.role_description: Appears as himself, performing for the troops.
filmography.plot: Hollywood stars perform at Travis Air Force Base to entertain soldiers bound for the Korean War.

filmography.title: I Wonder Who's Kissing Her Now
filmography.role_description: A supporting role in this biopic of songwriter Joseph E. Howard.
filmography.plot: The life and loves of songwriter Joseph E. Howard at the turn of the century.

filmography.title: S.O.B.
filmography.role_description: A studio executive in Blake Edwards' satire of Hollywood.
filmography.plot: A movie producer tries to salvage a box-office flop by reshooting it as a soft-core porn film.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Motion Picture - Comedy or Musical

filmography.title: The Purple Hills
filmography.role_description: A bounty hunter who claims an outlaw's body but faces trouble from the locals.
filmography.plot: Two bounty hunters claim the body of a wanted outlaw, but things get complicated when they realize the outlaw may have had a secret stash.

filmography.title: 20,000 Eyes
filmography.role_description: An insurance investigator who uncovers a fraud scheme.
filmography.plot: An insurance agent defrauds his company to pay off gambling debts.

filmography.title: Thunder Island
filmography.role_description: A hired killer recruited to assassinate an exiled dictator.
filmography.plot: A hitman is hired to assassinate the former dictator of a Latin American country living in exile on an island.

filmography.title: The Walls of Jericho
filmography.role_description: A minor role in this drama about small-town politics and friendship.
filmography.plot: A lawyer's political ambitions are threatened by his friendship with a childhood friend and a manipulative wife.

filmography.title: This Is the Army
filmography.role_description: An uncredited role as a soldier in the stage show segments.
filmography.plot: A musical revue featuring soldiers during World War II, based on the Irving Berlin Broadway show.
